summary: Diff implements a refreshed per-order status progression with timer cleanup in useOrderTracking and updates CustomerPortal Step 1 to show clickable dish images mapped to /assets/generated paths. However, no new static image assets were added under frontend/public/assets/generated as required.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add three new dish image files (pizza.dim_800x600.png, burger.dim_800x600.png, biryani.dim_800x600.png) under frontend/public/assets/generated and reference them from the Customer Portal Step 1 menu UI.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff references image paths under /assets/generated, but the diff shows no added files, so the required static assets do not appear to have been created/committed.
